n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)
indices = [i for i in range(n) if a[i] == s - a[i]]

print(len(indices))
print(*indices)

# SOLUTION
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

ans = []

for i in range(n):
    
    if a[i] == s-a[i]:
        ans.append(i+1)
        
print(len(ans))
print(*ans)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

ans = []
for i in range(n):
    if s - a[i] == a[i]:
        ans.append(i + 1)
        break
    s -= a[i]

print(len(ans))
for i in ans:
    print(i, end = ' ')
